trans-unit.source: Remove format on all contents
trans-unit.target: Supprimer le format pour tous les contenus

trans-unit.source: Select this option to perform the format removal operation on the whole contents of the editing area.
Remove all HTML format
Check this option if you wish to remove all HTML format.
trans-unit.target: Cocher cette option si vous souhaitez supprimer tout le format HTML

trans-unit.source: This option removes all HTML markup from the selected text.
trans-unit.target: Cette option supprime toutes les balises HTML présentes dans le texte selectionné

trans-unit.source: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:area
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: htmlArea RTE > Remove Format
Select the area to be cleaned
The format removal operation may be applied either to the currently highlighted text or to the whole contents of the editing area.
Use one of these two radio buttons to select the area to which you wish to apply the format removal operation.
The Remove Format feature offers options for cleaning up the HTML markup of the text being edited.
Remove all HTML inline markup and style
trans-unit.target: Supprimer toutes les balises et styles de MS word

trans-unit.source: Check this option if you wish to remove all HTML inline markup and style.
trans-unit.target: Sélectionner cette option si vous souhaitez supprimer toutes les balises et styles de MS word

trans-unit.source: EXT:rtehtmlarea/Resources/Public/Images/Plugins/RemoveFormat/remove-format.gif
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Remove format icon in the editor tool bar.
Remove images
Check this option if you wish to remove all images.
trans-unit.target: Cocher cette option si vous souhaiter supprimer toutes les images

trans-unit.source: This option removes all images from the selected text.
trans-unit.target: Cette option supprime toutes les images à partir texte sélectionné

trans-unit.source: Remove all MS Word markup and style
trans-unit.target: Supprimer toutes les balises et styles de MS word

trans-unit.source: Check this option if you wish to remove all MS Word markup and style.
trans-unit.target: Sélectionner cette option si vous souhaitez supprimer toutes les balises et styles de MS word

trans-unit.source: Replace non-breaking spaces
Check this option if you wish to replace non-breaking spaces with normal spaces.
This option replaces any non-breaking space with a simple normal space.
Select the types of format to be removed
The format removal operation may remove various types of format.
Check one or more of these check boxes to select the type(s) of format you wish to be removed.

xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:htmlFormat,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:msWordFormat,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:typographicalPunctuation,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:nonBreakingSpace,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:images,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:allHtml
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:area,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:options
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Remove format on selected text only
Select this option to perform the format removal operation on the currently selected text only.
xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:area
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Replace typographical punctuation
Check this option if you wish to replace typographical punctuation with ASCII character codes.
